name: HighMAT File
summary: Learn about .HMT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft has discontinued support for HighMAT. The HighMAT extension is only available for the Windows XP CD Writing Wizard.

description: File used by High Performance Media Access Technology (HighMAT), a technology developed jointly by Microsoft and Panasonic that is used to save and playback digital media on CDs; contains images, audio, and video saved in a proprietary format.
